column4: I used Partition Magic on Windows to try to resize some disks. It ended with an error about a corrupt ext2/3 file system. When I rebooted, GRUB had error 17.
What version of partition magic... 7, 8 or ?
We can get you back into windows without much problem, then you can try and fix partitions with the same program that you were using.
yes, but easy enough to remove, but nice to keep one for failsafe..
